title: IDragOperator.DragMode
description: Gets or sets the drag mode for this drag operation.
returns: 0 = Maximum move (move geometries rigidly, if possible) 1 = Minimum move (move the smallest number of geometries) 2 = Relaxation (solve geometries using relaxation) 3 = No propagation (move geometries with minimal transform propagation)
